summary: Mike is getting out of prison after serving four years for a bank robbery. Bona is arranging the party of all parties for him: a Christmas party.
cast: Jorma Tommila|Antti Reini|Rauno Juvonen|Oiva Lohtander|Sari Havas|Jari Halonen|Maija-Liisa Peuhu|Jukka Kärkkäinen|Iris-Lilja Lassila|Anna-Maria Klintrup|Asko Sahlman|Thierry Noir|Ragni Grönblom|Jukka Hytti|M.A. Numminen|Potsi|Aleksi Auer|Miikka Auer|Miravera Auer|Maria Isoaho|Sinikka Isoaho|Otto Siltala|Heikki Ahonius|Hanna Jokinen|Minna Parkkinen|Marko Tiusanen
title: Joulubileet
